title: Cyberpunk 2077
about: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action role-playing game developed by CD Projekt Red. Set in the futuristic Night City, a bustling metropolis obsessed with power, glamour, and body modification, players take on the role of V, a mercenary outlaw in search of a one-of-a-kind implant that holds the key to immortality.

keyFeatures.title: Play as V, a cyberpunk mercenary
keyFeatures.description: Customize your character’s cyberware, skillset, and playstyle to shape the story.

keyFeatures.title: Immersive open-world Night City
keyFeatures.description: Explore a vast, vibrant city full of life, danger, and endless possibilities.

keyFeatures.title: Branching storyline
keyFeatures.description: Choices matter – every decision you make shapes the story and the world around you.

keyFeatures.title: Cutting-edge visuals and technology
keyFeatures.description: Experience stunning visuals, ray-tracing, and next-gen performance.

keyFeatures.title: Phantom Liberty Expansion
keyFeatures.description: Dive into a new spy-thriller adventure alongside major updates and gameplay improvements.

details.platforms: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S

systemSpecs.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon R9 Fury
